Base CRM - Palo Alto, CA -----

Full Time Positions Available: - Content Marketing Manager - UX Design - Product Support Specialist - Data Scientist / Data Engineer (Python, R, Java) - Many more

Apply online at https://getbase.com/company/careers/

About Us: We're building the next generation of sales software. Base is a cross-platform, Post-PC CRM used by 10,000+ businesses to manage sales and customer relationships. Leveraging new patterns of usage with ubiquitous mobility, Base offers substantial productivity gains. Base is the #1 CRM app for iOS and Android. We've raised $23 million backed by RRE, Index Ventures, Social+Capital and others. Come join our team and help build sales software that teams actually want to use!
